name: Nigel Brown - The Myth of Meritocracy by The Baby Developer Show
summary:
In this episode, Nathaniel chats with Nigel Brown about his journey into tech and deep diving into some very important topics such as 'The Myth of Meritocracy', self care and avoiding burnout.
STAY IN TOUCH: twitter.com/chatterboxCoder ; twitch.tv/chatterboxcoder
